name: The Butler (IndieEclipse)
description:
Roam an infinite world where you are the only survivor against hordes of zombies. All guns and ammo are lost items dropped by other previous survivors :D

Source: https://github.com/Hanjun-Cho/Global-Game-Jam-2021

T - drop gun
LMB - shoot

Credits:
Hanjun Cho - Programmer, Artist - 15 years old
Brian Kim - Programmer - 15 years old
Jazzton Lu - Artist, Designer - 15 years old
Jared Xing - Artist - 15 years old
Peter Zhang - Musician - 17 years old
